Posts.Content: I had Calcifications biopsied 7 years ago benign. Then again last year benign. At follow there were more. Just had an mri. Will also need biopsy again. So frustrating. And wondering if it is cancer are Calcifications always early stage?
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications and breast cancer

Posts.Content: I too have had Calcifications biopsied that came back benign. Facing another biopsy. Dr ordered mri first this time. Anyone else hsve Mri before biopsy on Calcifications?
Posts.Title: Small cluster of microcalcification

Posts.Content: Cindi, did you eventually stop getting the Calcifications?
Posts.Title: Small cluster of microcalcification

Posts.Content: Sorry you are going through this. This time I am having an mri before the biopsy on Calcifications. Wonder if anyone else has done this? My dr said mri gives a better picture and biopsy moves things around do better to do mri first.
Posts.Title: Small cluster of microcalcification

Posts.Content: If Calcifications are biopsied and malignant are they always dcis or early stage?
Posts.Title: Calcifications
